tool_description: A number of useful calculations for gym goers
name: Gym calculations
title: Gym calculations

api_list.name: /1rm
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gym-calculations.p.rapidapi.com/1rm"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gym-calculations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
